But the angels of God are grieved at every manifestation 

                                                       61 

of a harsh spirit. God has given to every one a mind and an experience, possibly a higher experience than ours. We need to learn of Christ to be meek and lowly in heart. "Ask, and ye shall receive; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you."--MS 73, 1906.
